content: customer support call transcripts. The system must extract and organize information based on a predefined set of 80 questions. Examples include “Did the customer want to upgrade their plan?” or “Did the customer report bandwidth issues?” – Knowledge: The primary data source will be call transcripts, which contain varied human expressions and conversational styles. – Skill requirements: Interpreting and analyzing natural language, which includes understanding diverse writing styles and linguistic nuances to extract relevant insights from conversations.
